name: reverse
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maptoolkit.
Tool description: A toolkit for maps: Map tiles, address search (geocoding), routing, static maps & elevation
API description: Performs reverse geocoding to obtain location details from longitude and latitude coordinates.

lon.description: The longitude of the location to be reverse geocoded.

lat.description: The latitude of the location to be reverse geocoded.

polygon.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `de`.

language.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `de`.
